trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Clarksville
There were no other sightings in Clarksville on or around November 17th 2010
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
divs: sighting detailsmy son witnessed this and i reported it annonymously last year. we were watching "ufos over illinois" and what they described is what he saw. he got really excited and started telling me that this was what he saw. he was with a friend outside and the vehicle hovered above them right over the tree tops and then left quickly. the rest of us were in the house at the time and there were issues w\the electronics going crazy and shutting off. he said there were lights that appeared right before the object appeared and it was like the dell logo and then it appeared. we are near an army base, so who knows what this is, although we have witnessed several other incidents in this area at different locations as well.
Summary: My son saw it, it was triangular/chevron shape w/lights at the corner and a red light in the middle.
